item.description:
http://unionstreettavern.com/taverntrot

Tavern Trot
6th Annual, 2012 Union Street Tavern Trot
Sunday, September 16th, 2012

Come join us rain or shine for our 6th Annual 3.5 mile road and trail race through historic Windsor Center USATF certified #CT09017JHP & Manchester Road Race qualifier. Proceeds to benefit Alex's Lemonade Foundation, a national charitable foundation for childhood cancer research.

11:00 AM - 12:00 Noon: Registration
at the Union Street Tavern, 20 Union Street, Windsor, CT

12:30 PM: Race Start Time

Awards Presentation: Following the race at the Union Street Tavern


Water and rest stop available along race route

Free Refreshments, Beer and Food

Live Entertainment

Walkers Welcome
item.name: Windsor Tavern Trot
